item.title: SWN
item.description: score:-61 Chances: Southwestern Energy (SWN) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 30.77% and 11.95%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2023. Higher oil production and reduction in marketing purchases aid Southwestern’s Q4 earnings. The longer-term bull case for natural gas rests on expanding U.
